title: (Delegation Of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 211 of 2023), hereby
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Commercial Vehicle
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Commercial Vehicle 

Roadworthiness (Vehicle Testing) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 November 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited commercial vehicle roadworthiness (vehicle testing) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2023 (2) regulation come operation 1 november 2023

title: (Delegation Of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 211 of 2023), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations substitute Schedules 1, 2 and 3 to S.I. No. 347 of 2013 - 
Commercial Vehicle Roadworthiness (Vehicle Testing) (No. 2) Regulations
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation substitute schedule 1 2 3 s.i no 347 2013 - commercial vehicle roadworthiness (vehicle testing) (no 2) regulation
